overview: BMCHosting.com is an innovative privately owned and operated web hosting company established in 1996, providing support for ColdFusion Web Hosting, Joomla Web Hosting, Mura Web Hosting, Drupal Web Hosting, Wordpress web hosting and other technologies all managed with a powerful control panel. Our day-to-day client tech-support is provided by people who know what they are talking about! All support requests are answered by experts who are able to find a solution or attend to your query firsthand, right away.
